title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 5, pt. 398 - Supplemental Security Income (SSI) Additional State Payments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 5, pt. 398 - Supplemental Security Income (SSI) Additional State Payments

State Regulations

Subpart 398-1 - SCOPE AND PURPOSE (§ 398-1.1)

Subpart 398-2 - DEFINITIONS (§ 398-2.1)

Subpart 398-3 - STATE SUPPLEMENTAL PERSONAL NEEDS ALLOWANCE (SSPNA) (§ 398-3.1 to 398-3.4)

Subpart 398-4 - STATE SUPPLEMENT PROGRAM (SSP) (§ 398-4.1 to 398-4.7)

Subpart 398-5 - INITIAL AND CONTINUING ELIGIBILITY (§ 398-5.1 to 398-5.2)

Subpart 398-6 - APPLICANT/RECIPIENT REPORTING RESPONSIBILITIES (§ 398-6.1 to 398-6.2)

Subpart 398-7 - FAILURE OR REFUSAL TO COMPLY (§ 398-7.1)

Subpart 398-8 - NOTICE REQUIREMENTS (§ 398-8.1)

Subpart 398-9 - NOTICE REQUIREMENTS (§ 398-9.1 to 398-9.3)

Subpart 398-10 - ADMINISTRATIVE FAIR HEARINGS (§ 398-10.1 to 398-10.5)

Subpart 398-11 - OVERPAYMENTS AND UNDERPAYMENTS (§ 398-11.1 to 398-11.3)

Subpart 398-12 - RECOVERY OF EQUIVALENT BENEFITS (§ 398-12.1 to 398-12.3)

Subpart 398-13 - CONFIDENTIALITY (§ 398-13.1 to 398-13.4)

Subpart 398-14 - FILE RETENTION (§ 398-14.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. B, art. 5, pt. 398

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3], 34[3], 131[1], 209[2-a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
